em.span: To provide comprehensive education and service programs of superior quality to children and adults who are deaf, blind, deafblind and multidisabled and their families.
To transform the lives of those we serve beyond expectations by refusing to let adversity limit any individual's potential.

span.p: AIDB places a high priority on accessibility to all our programs and, together with Blackboard, has taken great care to provide a quality website. If you have a question or need to report an accessibility or functionality issue with this site please contact aidbwebmaster@aidb.org.
